revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Shoal Cave |image = [[File:Shoal Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Shoal Cave. |tokens = 28,000 |location = On Route 135, north of Mossdeep City. }} '''Shoal Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 290,000 |- | Snorunt (Boss) || 900,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Golbat * Spheal * Tentacool * Magikarp * Wailmer * Snorunt (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
